translations: 抑制（生物体的）免疫反应（immunosuppress 的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.sentence: "We thought we would see tumors because they're immunosuppressed, but we didn't," says Verma.
sentences.translation: Verma说“我们本以为由于小鼠的免疫系统受到抑制，我们能看到肿瘤的发生，但实际上我们并没看到。”

sentences.sentence: So the MCP can improve NK cell activity and has no immunosuppressed functions in normal mice.
sentences.translation: 因此，冬寒菜粉可提高正常小鼠NK细胞活性，而对其无免疫抑制作用。

sentences.sentence: The effects of RHPS & APS on immune function in normal mice and immunosuppressed mice were studied.
sentences.translation: 红芪多糖（RHPS）和黄芪多糖（APS）对正常小鼠和免疫抑制小鼠的免疫功能有影响。
